review: This game was fun and all when I first started, I was also reaaally baad.But then, after a couple of days I started getting better.So good infact that a buch of ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ squeakers got so butthurt they reported me, ALL OF THEM.Now my account is 'Globally Untrusted' and on cooldown.So if you're the really competitive type, do not get this game.You cannot be better than anyone.
I totally recommend this game! Although it's one of those games that are only fun with friends, it truly is awesome!10/10 Just be aware, if you do play alone make sure to wear cheap underpants.
